title: Things I've Built in Crypto
summary: A running list of things I've built in and around the crypto space.
content:
A running list of things I've built in and around this space.

simsim

A (sim)ple (sim)ulation framework for generalized dynamical systems, in Rust.

solsim

A simulator for complex systems on the Solana blockchain.

Solana Economic Simulator

A Streamlit app for simulating Solana validator economics.

Anchor Escrow Program

A toy implementation of a Solana escrow program in Anchor and React.
